common.answer: Cancellations made 30 days or more before check-in receive a full refund minus processing fees. Cancellations within 30 days are subject to our detailed cancellation policy.
common.question: What is your cancellation policy?

common.answer: Yes, we accept all major credit cards including Visa, MasterCard, and American Express.
